parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the given suppression value for the given unit. The value range is from 0 to 1. <br><br>  
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The unit must not be [[objNull]], must be [[local]] and [[alive]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''setSuppression''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - suppression value from 0 to 1

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> AI_unit_1 [[setSuppression]] 1;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getSuppression]], [[suppressFor]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
